title: shabhari giri vaasa
sahitya:
shabari giri vAsa sarvEsha   
shubhakara sundara suguNavilAsA

anupallavi

tripuramuna velayu nIdivya rUpamu!
prabhuvu nI sannadhi cErnugrahimpumu 

caraNam

makara jyOti  darshanamunu vEDi nI 
giri sikaramuna mEi maraci gumi kUDi
madhura smrutulu kalgE nI mahimanu pADi
adharaNanu kOrE nI tOti calamaDe
